subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text:
{{Han char|rn=61|rad=心|as=06|sn=9|four=|canj=PJHP|ids=⿰[[忄]][[宅]]}}

# [[disappoint]]ed
# to [[fail]] in [[attain]]ing one's [[purpose]]
# to be disappointed in attaining one's [[ambition]]s
# to be [[surprise]]d
# to be [[amaze]]d, to [[marvel]]
# [[think]], [[consider]], [[ponder]], [[contemplate]]
# [[expect]] or [[hope]] with [[eagerness]]
# a [[credit]]
# [[straightforward]], [[faithful]] and [[upright]]
# to [[reprimand]], to [[discipline]], [[punish]]
